singleCourseData.name: The Modern React Bootcamp
singleCourseData.blurb: This projects-based bootcamp covered both original and newer React concepts, so I now have a practical understanding of both class components and functional components that use hooks and contexts. There were a lot of larger and complex projects in this course, and the knowledge I gained from it allowed me to complete React projects completely on my own.
skillsLearned: Understanding of how React works and how to use it independently.
How to use tools like Create React App and Next JS.
Made apps with both traditional class components and newer functional components with hooks and contexts.
